update.description:
* updates for issue #1959 ImuSensor::SetReferenceOrientation proposal
* fix acceleration to be in the imu frame. add SetWorldToReferencePose function to set the reference frame definition for this imu in the world. issue #1959
* adding tests
* fix code_check complaints
update.title: Issue #1959 imu fixes

content.raw: looks good to me too, thanks for the updates.
content.html: looks good to me too, thanks for the updates.

content.raw: It's looking good to me. I'll follow up with another pull request that expands the test but won't affect the released code
content.html: It's looking good to me. I'll follow up with another pull request that expands the test but won't affect the released code

content.raw: I think centripetal is a more precise term, but they both convey the same idea
content.html: I think centripetal is a more precise term, but they both convey the same idea

content.raw: oh, i guess it's the pitch angle?
content.html: oh, i guess it's the pitch angle?

content.raw: I'm removing it in my local test branch as well.
content.html: I'm removing it in my local test branch as well.

content.raw: this normalization step shouldn't be necessary

Just a general thought that I'll file in an issue:

* Does it makes sense to store a reference pose, since we are only using the orientation but not the position?
content.html:
Just a general thought that I'll file in an issue:

  • Does it makes sense to store a reference pose, since we are only using the orientation but not the position?
